oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A THREE DIMENSIONAL MODEL FOR WAVE INDUCED CURRENTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Li, Bin
Maddrell, Roger J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: current
wave induced current
current model
3D model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, a three-dimensional model which is based on the Navier-stokes equations is developed. The finite volume method and a time-splitting technique are used to solve the equations. Longshore and crossshore currents induced by waves are reproduced by the model and the results are compared with existing experimental data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 24 (1994): Proceedings of 24th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Kobe, Japan, 1994.
